body:
Comment 4: 
Yup, CC=clang. After CC=clang all.bash, go env reports:

GOARCH="amd64"
GOBIN=""
GOCHAR="6"
GOEXE=""
GOHOSTARCH="amd64"
GOHOSTOS="freebsd"
GOOS="freebsd"
GORACE=""
CC="clang"
GOGCCFLAGS="-g -O2 -fPIC -m64 -pthread -fno-caret-diagnostics -Qunused-arguments"
CXX="g++"
CGO_ENABLED="1"

Hm, funny there's no g++ file on this node.
